data.message: Hey!! Facebook Administrators, I'm really reporting the whole chronological-chart displaying my "Facebook Timeline" has just mysteriously disappeared in a horridly bizarre fashion that is tremendously problematic. Additionally I am presently "UNABLE" to found any trace of the chronological-chart for my "Facebook Timeline" at this frustratingly troubling moment that nightmarishly occurred on my Facebook account. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I urgently need Facebook to broadly address the specified things entirely mentioned today{January.8,2016) concerning my current "reported dilemma". Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U officially help{SOS) me out by directly providing a resolution{FIXES, etc.) capable of remedying the "Big Issues" that are illustrated in my message.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Roberto. We'd like to collect more information. Would you send us a private message with more details? Thanks. -Jordan

Hey There!!!! Facebook Administrators, yesterday I've sent a "Private Message" related to the "huge reported dilemmas" concerning the chronological-chart for my "Facebook Timeline". But I'm still experiencing horridly problematic circumstances stemming from what was entirely mentioned yesterday within context to my "Majorly Timeline Issues". Additionally I am seriously complaining that the whole "Chronological-Chart" for my Facebook Timeline continues to be in a bizarre state tied to the mysterious-disappearances. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I really need Facebook to fully address those specified things illustrated in my messages referring to the "Reported-Problems". Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U tremendously help{SOS) me out by directly providing a urgent resolution able to remedy{FIXES, etc.) the "Current Troubles".

Hey!! Facebook Administrators, I am reporting that my "Facebook-Timeline" is in a massively troubling condition within deep relation to the whole ill-fated "Chronological-Chart Disappearance". Additionally I'm presently UNABLE to "Find or Search" for anything in my entire Facebook-Timeline due to horridly bad dilemmas{Technical-Difficulties, etc.) tied to the Chronological-Chart vanishing. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I majorly need Facebook to officially address those "Reported-Problems" plaguing my Facebook-Timeline mentioned today{January.11,2016). BTW I am continuing to seriously complain what is Facebook going to do about this currently grotesque situation occurring throughout my Facebook account. Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U hurry up! I am sincerely pleading for help{SOS) that will directly provide a urgently resolution{FIXES, etc.) ASAP!!!!! towards the "Reported Issues".
